title: PHP Extensions-ionCube
text1: 1. ionCube extension: for decrypting ionCube Encoder encryption scripts! Official website: https://www.ioncube.com/
text2: 2. ionCube extension is different from PHP version, each PHP version needs to be installed separately, you can check whether it is installed or not in the extension status.
text3: 3. If not installed, click Actions->Install to install the ionCube extension
text4: 4. After installation, you can click Actions->Copy Link to copy the extension link code and paste it into the PHP configuration file to use the ionCube extension
text5: 5. After changing the PHP configuration file, remember to click Restart or Reload Configuration in the Services section to make the configuration take effect
